Package net.egartley.gamelib.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.egartley.gamelib.graphics.Sprite
  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    A row, or "strip", of individual frames for an entity (they are all the same height and width)
    See Also:
    SpriteSheet, Entity

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> frames
      All of the possible frames that the sprite could use
      int height
